mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY (DIARY_ID, USER_ID, DIARY_DATE, CONTENT) VALUES (DIARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT DIARY_ID AS diaryId, USER_ID, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(DIARY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS diaryDate FROM DIARY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY DIARY_DATE DESC
